name: buffer
description: Node.js Buffer API, for the browser

scripts.test-node: tape test/*.js test/node/*.js test/node-es6/*.js && OBJECT_IMPL=true tape test/*.js test/node/*.js
scripts.perf-node: node perf/bracket-notation.js && node perf/concat.js && node perf/copy-big.js && node perf/copy.js && node perf/new-big.js && node perf/new.js && node perf/readDoubleBE.js && node perf/readFloatBE.js && node perf/readUInt32LE.js && node perf/slice.js && node perf/writeFloatBE.js
